name: Through The Tomb
description: Through The Tomb is a first-person parkour game where the player is tasked with escaping the Tomb before time runs out. Along the way you will collect Artifacts that allow you to unlock new sections of the Tomb which will test the playerâ€™s 3D platforming skills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 104 MB available space
